definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
elderly man/father/father-in-law/neck feathers of a bird (old)

sentences.english: Recently, I met an 80-year-old-man who looked like 60.
sentences.chinese: 最近，我遇见了一位看上去像60岁的80老翁。

sentences.english: Merchant hurries to old man there, see old man is in with a few people drink.
sentences.chinese: 店主赶到老翁那儿，见老翁正和几个人在喝酒。

sentences.english: Merchant hurries to old man there, see old man is in with a few people drink.
sentences.chinese: 店主赶到老翁那儿，见老翁正和几个人在喝酒。

sentences.english: This poor old man is fainting with hunger,let him sit down and eat.
sentences.chinese: 这位可怜的老翁快晕倒了，让他坐下来吃些东西。

sentences.english: This sketch describes an old man's gypsum head statue.
sentences.chinese: 这幅素描是描绘一名老翁的石膏头像。

sentences.english: Once upon a time, there was an old man who lived with his son on the borders of the country.
sentences.chinese: 从前，一位老翁和他的儿子住在塞外的边境上。

sentences.english: Not infrequently does the septuagenarian go abroad.
sentences.chinese: 那个年逾古稀的老翁经常出国。

sentences.english: Then, merchant pays old man 9 1000 copper cash by 10 two silver.
sentences.chinese: 于是，店主就按10两银子付给老翁9千铜钱。

sentences.english: Miranda:A 94 year-old man had a child in India.
sentences.chinese: 印度就有位94岁的老翁还是生了孩子。

definition: white head of hair/fig. old person
falling hair of a child/(fig.) child
